entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
